structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS AS TO OFFICES AND OFFICERS -- SOCIAL SECURITY FOR PUBLIC EMPLOYEES -- EMPLOYEES RETIREMENT SYSTEM

law.catch_line: Action for injunctive relief for injury due to violation of KRS 61.980 to 61.988.
law.text: Any person injured by a violation of KRS 61.980 to 61.988 may bring an action for injunctive relief in the Circuit Court of the county in which the person resides or in which the covered entity is located. An action for injunctive relief shall be commenced within four (4) years after the cause of action accrues. A cause of action for a continuing violation of KRS 61.980 to 61.988 shall accrue at the time of the latest occurrence of the violation.
law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 536, sec. 36, effective July 14, 2000.
